The suspect, from northern Paris, is accused of aiding organized theft and conspiracy. The October 19th robbery saw 88 million euros worth of royal treasures vanish in under eight minutes, with one piece later recovered damaged.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/louvre-heist-30-year-old-woman-charged-in-paris-museum-theft-report-says/articleshow/125018122.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/louvre-heist-30-year-old-woman-charged-in-paris-museum-theft-report-says/articleshow/125018122.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 01 Nov 2025 19:56:19 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="69210" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-125018306,imgsize-69210.cms"/></item><item><title>Andhra temple stampede: Probe ordered as rush kills 9 devotees - top developments</title><description><![CDATA[A stampede at the Sri Venkateswara Swamy Temple in Kasibugga, Srikakulam district, claimed the lives of at least nine devotees, including an adolescent boy, and injured several others. The tragedy occurred due to a railing collapse and subsequent panic among an estimated 15,000 devotees gathered for Ekadashi darshan at the newly inaugurated temple.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/andhra-temple-stampede-inquiry-ordered-as-rush-kills-9-devotees-top-developments/articleshow/125015807.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/andhra-temple-stampede-inquiry-ordered-as-rush-kills-9-devotees-top-developments/articleshow/125015807.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 01 Nov 2025 17:44:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1175009" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-125016049,imgsize-1175009.cms"/></item><item><title>IPL trade: RR, DC close to Samson, Tristan Stubbs swap; KKR press for KL Rahul— Exclusive</title><description><![CDATA[With Sanju Samson clear on leaving Rajasthan Royals, Delhi Capitals and Rajasthan Royals have been locked in negotiations with Tristan Stubbs set to go the other way. KL Rahul was also an option discussed but that was shut down rather quickly. Kolkata Knight Riders, meanwhile, are also pushing for the India batter but without a feasible swappable player.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/ipl/top-stories/ipl-trade-rr-dc-close-to-sanju-samson-tristan-stubbs-swap-kkr-press-for-kl-rahul-exclusive/articleshow/125016941.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/ipl/top-stories/ipl-trade-rr-dc-close-to-sanju-samson-tristan-stubbs-swap-kkr-press-for-kl-rahul-exclusive/articleshow/125016941.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 01 Nov 2025 18:34:39 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SAHIL MALHOTRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="33360" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-125016939,imgsize-33360.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Two words’ wipe $29 billion off Mark Zuckerberg’s wealth, lowest in over two years on Billionaires Index</title><description><![CDATA[Mark Zuckerberg's net worth plummeted by $29.2 billion, dropping him to fifth on the Bloomberg Billionaires Index. This significant loss was triggered by Meta's substantial planned capital expenditures for AI infrastructure, including data center expansion. Investors expressed concern over the company's aggressive spending strategy and a $30 billion debt issuance.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/two-words-that-wiped-29-billion-from-mark-zuckerbergs-wealth-in-just-one-day-taking-him-to-his-lowest-ranking-in-two-plus-years-on-billionaires-index/articleshow/125020096.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/two-words-that-wiped-29-billion-from-mark-zuckerbergs-wealth-in-just-one-day-taking-him-to-his-lowest-ranking-in-two-plus-years-on-billionaires-index/articleshow/125020096.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 01 Nov 2025 22:18:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="49314" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-125020090,imgsize-49314.cms"/></item><item><title>52% of Gen Z decline being bosses: Leadership evolves; skills drive growth</title><description><![CDATA[Gen Z is redefining career success, with a significant portion opting out of middle management roles. A Robert Walters survey reveals 52% of Gen Z professionals prefer individual contributor paths, viewing management as high-stress and low-reward. This shift prompts organizations to explore alternative leadership models beyond traditional people management.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/careers/news/52-percent-of-gen-z-say-no-to-becoming-managers-why-young-professionals-arent-chasing-the-boss-title-anymore/articleshow/125016464.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/careers/news/52-percent-of-gen-z-say-no-to-becoming-managers-why-young-professionals-arent-chasing-the-boss-title-anymore/articleshow/125016464.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 01 Nov 2025 18:11:41 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="194387" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-125016509,imgsize-194387.cms"/></item><item><title>Mokama murder: EC orders replacement of two officials; seeks action compliance report</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bihar-political-killing-ec-orders-replacement-of-two-officials-seeks-action-compliance-report/articleshow/125018184.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bihar-political-killing-ec-orders-replacement-of-two-officials-seeks-action-compliance-report/articleshow/125018184.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 01 Nov 2025 20:05:11 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>BHARTI JAIN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="52818" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-125018186,imgsize-52818.cms"/></item><item><title>Former India U-19 cricketer Rajesh Banik dies in accident; Tripura cricket mourns</title><description><![CDATA[Former India U-19 cricketer Rajesh Banik tragically passed away in a road accident at 40. A talented all-rounder for Tripura, Banik represented the state in numerous first-class, List A, and T20 matches. He also served as a selector for the U-16 team, leaving a significant mark on Tripura's cricket. His untimely demise has deeply saddened the cricketing fraternity.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/tragic-ex-india-u-19-world-cup-and-ranji-trophy-cricketer-passes-away-in-road-mishap/articleshow/125018259.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/tragic-ex-india-u-19-world-cup-and-ranji-trophy-cricketer-passes-away-in-road-mishap/articleshow/125018259.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 01 Nov 2025 20:19:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="767652" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-125018486,imgsize-767652.cms"/></item><item><title>Bill Gates' warning on AI: Tons of investments will be 'dead ends'</title><description><![CDATA[Microsoft founder Bill Gates warns many AI investments will fail. He compares the current AI boom to the dot-com era.  A study shows 95% of companies see no return on AI investments.  Most AI tools boost individual work but lack business impact.  Many fail due to workflow issues and poor integration.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/bill-gates-warning-on-ai-tons-of-investments-will-be-dead-ends-and-/articleshow/125011947.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/bill-gates-warning-on-ai-tons-of-investments-will-be-dead-ends-and-/articleshow/125011947.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 01 Nov 2025 12:51:27 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="27070" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-125011938,imgsize-27070.cms"/></item><item><title>Bihar polls: Opinion poll predicts close victory for NDA; Tejashwi most preferred CM face</title><description><![CDATA[An opinion poll by JVC Poll on Times Now predicts the JD(U)-led NDA will retain power in Bihar, securing 120-140 seats in the 243-member assembly. Tejashwi Yadav leads the popularity chart for CM, while the NDA is projected to get 41-43% vote share. Elections are scheduled for November 6 and 11.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bihar-polls-opinion-poll-predicts-close-victory-for-nda-tejashwi-yadav-most-preferred-cm-face/articleshow/125016709.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bihar-polls-opinion-poll-predicts-close-victory-for-nda-tejashwi-yadav-most-preferred-cm-face/articleshow/125016709.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 01 Nov 2025 18:24:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="782721" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-125016741,imgsize-782721.cms"/></item><item><title>'Had they informed ...': CM Naidu blames organisers for temple stampede; cites coordination lapse</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/had-they-informed-cm-naidu-blames-organisers-for-temple-stampede-cites-coordination-lapse/articleshow/125014580.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/had-they-informed-cm-naidu-blames-organisers-for-temple-stampede-cites-coordination-lapse/articleshow/125014580.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 01 Nov 2025 16:09:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="42476" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-125014833,imgsize-42476.cms"/></item><item><title>Trapped by duties: India’s workforce and toxic jobs; why quitting isn’t an option</title><description><![CDATA[A viral post reveals the silent struggle of Indian professionals enduring toxic bosses. Financial needs, family care, and education force many to stay, despite emotional harassment. This situation highlights a hidden crisis where employees face severe stress and burnout. Companies champion wellness, but reality shows a gap. Speaking out is a crucial first step towards dignity.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/careers/news/i-have-to-survive-three-more-years-why-responsibilities-trap-indias-workforce-in-toxic-jobs-they-cant-leave/articleshow/125017558.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/careers/news/i-have-to-survive-three-more-years-why-responsibilities-trap-indias-workforce-in-toxic-jobs-they-cant-leave/articleshow/125017558.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 01 Nov 2025 19:17:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>LAKSHIMA SAREEN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="75370" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-125017590,imgsize-75370.cms"/></item><item><title>Facebook-parent Meta CTO Andrew Bosworth has a 'relationship advice' for everyone</title><description><![CDATA[Meta CEO Andrew Bosworth advises managing personal relationships like a stock portfolio. He suggests diversifying emotional investments, investing intentionally, and avoiding panic during emotional 'market dips.'  Bosworth emphasizes that influence should be proportional to emotional investment, urging readers to cut losses on unearned emotional equity and rebalance their 'emotional economy' for a more rational approach to relationships.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/facebook-parent-meta-cto-andrew-bosworth-has-a-relationship-advice-for-everyone-dont-panic-when-/articleshow/125012336.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/facebook-parent-meta-cto-andrew-bosworth-has-a-relationship-advice-for-everyone-dont-panic-when-/articleshow/125012336.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 01 Nov 2025 13:21:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1451794" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-125012323,imgsize-1451794.cms"/></item><item><title>'Trophy is here, just pick it up': IND stars back Harmanpreet’s team - watch</title><description><![CDATA[Harmanpreet Kaur and co. are set to play South Africa in the World Cup final on Sunday. This historic match marks India's third final appearance as they aim for their first ICC title.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/icc-womens-world-cup-2025/trophy-is-here-you-just-have-to-pick-it-up-team-india-stars-rally-behind-harmanpreet-kaurs-side-ahead-of-world-cup-final/articleshow/125019422.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/icc-womens-world-cup-2025/trophy-is-here-you-just-have-to-pick-it-up-team-india-stars-rally-behind-harmanpreet-kaurs-side-ahead-of-world-cup-final/articleshow/125019422.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 01 Nov 2025 22:06:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="55294" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-125019782,imgsize-55294.cms"/></item><item><title>3 everyday foods that can help you live longer, according to science</title><description><![CDATA[Eating whole grains, nuts, and fruits and vegetables can help you live longer. Making these simple food choices a regular part of your diet can significantly boost your health and lifespan.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/food-news/want-to-live-longer-these-3-foods-are-linked-to-better-heart-health-and-lower-disease-risk-studies-show/articleshow/124938996.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/food-news/want-to-live-longer-these-3-foods-are-linked-to-better-heart-health-and-lower-disease-risk-studies-show/articleshow/124938996.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 01 Nov 2025 20:54:47 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="77778" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-124939293,imgsize-77778.cms"/></item><item><title>Stephen Curry playing tonight vs Pacers? Warriors issue key injury update</title><description><![CDATA[Stephen Curry is set to lead the Golden State Warriors against the injury-plagued Indiana Pacers on November 1, 2025. Despite missing key players, Curry's MVP-caliber play fuels the Warriors' Western Conference success. The Pacers, without star Tyrese Haliburton, face a significant challenge, hoping to find resilience against the experienced Warriors squad.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/is-stephen-curry-playing-tonight-vs-the-indiana-pacers-latest-update-on-the-golden-state-warriors-stars-injury-report-november-1-2025/articleshow/125018847.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/is-stephen-curry-playing-tonight-vs-the-indiana-pacers-latest-update-on-the-golden-state-warriors-stars-injury-report-november-1-2025/articleshow/125018847.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 01 Nov 2025 20:48:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>RAUNAK BOSE</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="52660" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-125018855,imgsize-52660.cms"/></item><item><title>'RJD to bring back jungle raj': BJP attacks on Tejashwi; cites Shahabuddin's son's nomination</title><description><![CDATA[The BJP has accused the RJD of reviving "baahubal" politics by fielding Mohammad Shahabuddin's son, Osama Shahab, from Siwan's Raghunathpur seat. BJP president JP Nadda warned of a return to "jungle raj," contrasting it with the development under Nitish Kumar and PM Modi. Voters are urged to support the NDA for stability and accelerated development.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/rjd-to-bring-back-jungle-raj-bjp-renews-attack-on-tejashwi-yadav-cites-shahabuddins-sons-nomination/articleshow/125014477.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/rjd-to-bring-back-jungle-raj-bjp-renews-attack-on-tejashwi-yadav-cites-shahabuddins-sons-nomination/articleshow/125014477.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 01 Nov 2025 16:01:32 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="856893" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-125014466,imgsize-856893.cms"/></item><item><title>Same entry and exit points, crowd surge: What led to deadly Andhra temple stampede - 10 key points</title><description><![CDATA[A stampede at the Venkateswara Swami Temple in Andhra Pradesh's Srikakulam claimed at least 10 lives and injured several others as a large crowd gathered for Ekadashi. The privately managed temple, not registered with the state endowments department, lacked official approvals, contributing to the chaos. Injured devotees are receiving treatment, with authorities fearing a rise in the death toll.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/same-entry-exit-points-crowd-surge-what-led-to-the-deadly-andhra-temple-stampede-10-key-points/articleshow/125012917.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/same-entry-exit-points-crowd-surge-what-led-to-the-deadly-andhra-temple-stampede-10-key-points/articleshow/125012917.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 01 Nov 2025 14:10:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="947298" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-125012943,imgsize-947298.cms"/></item><item><title>Caitlin Clark vs Paige Bueckers: Net worth and salary contract breakdown</title><description><![CDATA[Two new WNBA stars, Caitlin Clark and Paige Bueckers, are making waves. Clark has a higher net worth, largely due to significant endorsement deals. Bueckers also earns from sponsorships and a new basketball league. Both players are shaping the business of women's basketball, demonstrating their marketability on and off the court. Their financial journeys highlight their growing influence.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/caitlin-clark-vs-paige-bueckers-net-worth-salary-comparison-contract-details-and-more/articleshow/125016327.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/caitlin-clark-vs-paige-bueckers-net-worth-salary-comparison-contract-details-and-more/articleshow/125016327.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 01 Nov 2025 18:01:19 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="891446" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-125016328,imgsize-891446.cms"/></item><item><title>Heartbreak to hope: Harmanpreet's emotional words ahead of World Cup final</title><description><![CDATA[India's captain Harmanpreet Kaur expressed her team's readiness to finally clinch a global title, having experienced the pain of past defeats. Ahead of the Women's World Cup final against South Africa, she emphasised the team's hard work and collective spirit. This marks India's third final appearance, and they are determined to make this a 'special day' for the nation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/icc-womens-world-cup-2025/from-heartbreak-to-hope-harmanpreet-kaurs-emotional-words-ahead-of-world-cup-final-vs-south-africa/articleshow/125016409.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/icc-womens-world-cup-2025/from-heartbreak-to-hope-harmanpreet-kaurs-emotional-words-ahead-of-world-cup-final-vs-south-africa/articleshow/125016409.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 01 Nov 2025 18:06:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TIMESOFINDIA.COM</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="116452" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-125016427,imgsize-116452.cms"/></item><item><title>Is Giannis Antetokounmpo playing tonight? Bucks star’s injury status vs Kings</title><description><![CDATA[Giannis Antetokounmpo's season debut was unexpectedly delayed due to left knee patellar tendinopathy, causing him to miss the Milwaukee Bucks' game against the Golden State Warriors. Now listed as questionable for Saturday's clash with the Sacramento Kings, his sudden setback raises concerns about his performance and playing rhythm, despite his stellar early-season statistics.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/is-giannis-antetokounmpo-playing-tonight-milwaukee-bucks-stars-injury-update-and-status-against-sacramento-kings-game-revealed-11-01-2015/articleshow/125016512.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/is-giannis-antetokounmpo-playing-tonight-milwaukee-bucks-stars-injury-update-and-status-against-sacramento-kings-game-revealed-11-01-2015/articleshow/125016512.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 01 Nov 2025 18:14:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="45754" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-125016553,imgsize-45754.cms"/></item><item><title>How much farting is normal per day? Top nutrition coach reveals 'healthy' number</title><description><![CDATA[Passing gas is natural, with 10 to 20 times daily considered normal. Exceeding this may signal digestive problems or dietary imbalances. Foods like beans and cruciferous vegetables, along with stress and certain medications, can increase gas. Eating slowly, staying hydrated, and exercising can help manage excess gas. Too little gas can also indicate issues with gut movement or enzyme activity, according to Ryan Fernando.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/how-much-farting-is-normal-per-day-top-nutrition-coach-reveals-the-healthy-number/articleshow/124982291.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/how-much-farting-is-normal-per-day-top-nutrition-coach-reveals-the-healthy-number/articleshow/124982291.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 31 Oct 2025 09:03:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="437286" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-124982273,imgsize-437286.cms"/></item><item><title>Language row: Karnataka CM says English, Hindi hurting children’s talent</title><description><![CDATA[Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah accused the central government of neglecting Kannada and imposing Hindi, stating the state receives a "paltry amount" in return for its significant revenue contribution.       <description><![CDATA[The Ministry of Power is weighing a comprehensive reform roadmap to address the mounting debt of state electricity distribution companies.       <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/aviation/workers-reject-boeings-latest-offer-after-nearly-three-months-on-strike-19726892.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[The five-year offer was largely the same as offers previously rejected, which opens a new tab by union members. The company reduced the ratification bonus but added $3,000 in Boeing shares that vest over three years and a $1,000 retention bonus in four years.
